bibl.title: Two Partnership Agreements from the Dakhla Oasis.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: Reedition of two contracts for partnership in the caravan trade between the Dakhla Oasis and the Nile valley, drawn up between the same individuals in 319 and 320. - P. Genova [P.U.G.] I, 20 = P. Gascou 18. 4 July 319. - P. Genova [P.U.G.] I, 21 = P. Gascou 19. 25 July 320. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 145.4 P.U.G. I, 20 = P. Gascou 18; 21= P. Gascou 19
Roger S. Bagnall, Two Partnership Agreements from the Dakhla Oasis.
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 33-45, 2 figg.; - 655.

Reedition of two contracts for partnership in the caravan trade between the Dakhla Oasis and the Nile valley, drawn up between the same individuals in 319 and 320. - P. Genova [P.U.G.] I, 20 = P. Gascou 18. 4 July 319. - P. Genova [P.U.G.] I, 21 = P. Gascou 19. 25 July 320. - Avec résumé en anglais.
